name: komi-app
description: Progressive Web App para pedidos de comida con procesamiento de lenguaje natural

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:nlp" "npm run dev:restaurants" "npm run dev:users" "npm run dev:orders"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:nlp && npm run build:restaurants && npm run build:users && npm run build:orders
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../services/nlp-service && npm install && cd ../restaurants && npm install && cd ../users && npm install && cd ../orders && npm install && cd ../menu-recommender && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: concurrently "npm run test:nlp" "npm run test:restaurants" "npm run test:users" "npm run test:orders"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:services
scripts.lint:services: concurrently "npm run lint:nlp" "npm run lint:restaurants" "npm run lint:users" "npm run lint:orders"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env.local && echo 'Please configure your environment variables in .env.local'

author: Komi Team
